page_content: The page discusses guidelines for the Burzelbaum Award for preschool children in the area of Basel-Stadt, focusing on physical activity and nutrition.
The page discusses the impact of the 1815 Tambora volcano eruption on skeletons from the 19th-century Basel hospital cemetery, revealing signs of famine.
The page serves as a central hub for spatial data queries, offering support and consultation for GIS software and geodatabases within the cantonal administration.
The page provides various tax forms related to property taxes, which can be electronically filled, printed, and saved locally.
The page provides information on how to use the GeoSuite software by swisstopo for coordinate transformations between LV03BS and LV95.
The page discusses an archaeological excavation at the former St. Johann hospital cemetery, focusing on the discovery of skeletons and the history of the site.
The page provides CAD guidelines and templates for architectural and building management projects, including CAD-Plan templates and DWG-Export guides.
The page discusses the health benefits of handwriting, including its positive effects on memory, creativity, and fine motor skills.
The page provides educational materials on vaping, including exercises and workshop guidelines for middle school and secondary school levels.
The page discusses traffic management in Basel-Stadt, mentioning the use of software in traffic light control systems for specific intersections.
The page offers information on a software solution for managing work and residence permits online, targeting businesses. A downloadable PDF guide is available.
The page discusses eServices and Jobroom platforms for job seekers and employers, providing guidelines for registration and use.
The page provides guidelines and documents for public procurement processes, including PDF guides on various procedures.
The page discusses the Talent Eye program, aimed at fostering athletic talent in children from the second grade of primary school.
The page provides guidelines for public records management, including a downloadable PDF on setting retention periods for documents.
The page offers a course on how to combat voles in gardens, discussing their lifestyle and providing practical instructions for setting traps.
The page provides information on BalTax, a software solution for filling out tax returns. It offers both online and downloadable versions, along with PDF and webpage guides for usage.

The page provides information on becoming a First Responder in Basel-Stadt, including the use of a specialized app for alerting and coordinating First Responders. PDF and webpage guides are available.
The page discusses the principles and procedures for efficient records management, including guidelines for document retention and disposal. PDF guides are available for setting retention periods.
